Use Case: Pre-distribute for Game Monopoly
------------------------------------------

Airdrop for Game Monopoly drops five package coins, every package has 100 coins and situates 
in different coordinate. Players must go to the sites within eight blocks time, otherwise the 
coins will disappear.
Another FSM, that is Distribute for Game Monopoly, which distribute these coins to the players
who are there.
The sites are decided by the last block hash, and different with the last sites.
for example
[1,4]
[11,20]
[35,47]
[66,65]
[99,86]

Const
---------
@00 ==> 0000000000000000	@timestamp
@01 ==> 0000000000000000	@x1
@02 ==> 0000000000000000	@y1
@03 ==> 3c00000000000000	@x2
@04 ==> 0000000000000000	@y2
@05 ==> 0000000000000000	@x3
@06 ==> 3c00000000000000	@y3
@07 ==> 3c00000000000000	@x4
@08 ==> 3c00000000000000	@y4
@09 ==> 2800000000000000	@x5
@0a ==> 2800000000000000	@x5
@0b ==> 0200000000000000	@address_airdropFSM = 2 (hardcoded)

Variables(must saved to blockchain)
---------
@0c == A1 block hash
@0d == A2
@0e == A3
@0f == A4
@10 == B1(x)
@11 == B2(y)
@12 == B3(@seed)
@13 == B4@(count)
@14 ==> @tmp


Script Assembly
---------------

if @timestamp not zero goto init                         1e000000000d
set @timestamp to AT creation time                       35010300000000

:init
puts the block hash of the previous block in A		 32 0303
set @count to 1						 01 13000000 0100000000000000

sets B1 from @x1					 33 1601 01000000
sets B2 from @y1					 33 1701 02000000
sets @seed to A1					 35 0001 12000000
airdrop to coordinate(B1,B2) with @seed, @count		 34 5004 12000000 13000000
inc @count						 04 13000000

sets B1 from @x2					 33 1601 03000000
sets B2 from @y2					 33 1701 04000000
sets @seed to A2					 35 0101 12000000
airdrop to coordinate(B1,B2) with @seed, @count		 34 5004 12000000 13000000
inc @count						 04 13000000

sets B1 from @x3					 33 1601 05000000
sets B2 from @y3					 33 1701 06000000
sets @seed to A3					 35 0201 12000000
airdrop to coordinate(B1,B2) with @seed, @count		 34 5004 12000000 13000000
inc @count						 04 13000000

sets B1 from @x4					 33 1601 07000000
sets B2 from @y4					 33 1701 08000000
sets @seed to A4					 35 0301 12000000
airdrop to coordinate(B1,B2) with @seed, @count		 34 5004 12000000 13000000
inc @count						 04 13000000

sets B1 from @x5					 33 1601 09000000
sets B2 from @y5					 33 1701 0a000000
sets @tmp to A1						 35 0001 14000000
add @tmp to @seed					 06 12000000 14000000
airdrop to coordinate(B1,B2) with @seed, @count		 34 5004 12000000 13000000
finished						 28

machinecode
----------------


data
----------------
0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000003c00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000003c000000000000003c000000000000003c00000000000000280000000000000028000000000000000200000000000000

properties
----------------
01000000050000000a000000000c00000048000000

00000000* BNZ $00000000, :0000000d
00000006  FUN @00000000 0x301
0000000d  FUN 0x303
00000010  SET @00000013 #0000000000000001
0000001d  FUN 0x116 $00000001
00000024  FUN 0x117 $00000002
0000002b  FUN @00000012 0x100
00000032  FUN 0x450 $00000012 $00000013
0000003d  INC @00000013
00000042  FUN 0x116 $00000003
00000049  FUN 0x117 $00000004
00000050  FUN @00000012 0x101
00000057  FUN 0x450 $00000012 $00000013
00000062  INC @00000013
00000067  FUN 0x116 $00000005
0000006e  FUN 0x117 $00000006
00000075  FUN @00000012 0x102
0000007c  FUN 0x450 $00000012 $00000013
00000087  INC @00000013
0000008c  FUN 0x116 $00000007
00000093  FUN 0x117 $00000008
0000009a  FUN @00000012 0x103
000000a1  FUN 0x450 $00000012 $00000013
000000ac  INC @00000013
000000b1  FUN 0x116 $00000009
000000b8  FUN 0x117 $0000000a
000000bf  FUN @00000014 0x100
000000c6  ADD @00000012 @00000014
000000cf  FUN 0x450 $00000012 $00000013
000000da  FIN


00000000* if @timestamp not zero goto init                         1e000000000d
00000006  set @timestamp to AT creation time                       35010300000000

:init
0000000d  puts the block hash of the previous block in A		 32 0303
00000010  set @count to 1						 01 13000000 0100000000000000
0000001d  sets B1 from @x1					 33 1601 01000000
00000024  sets B2 from @y1					 33 1701 02000000
0000002b  sets @seed to A1					 35 0001 12000000
00000032  airdrop to coordinate(B1,B2) with @seed, @count		 34 5004 12000000 13000000

0000003d  inc @count						 04 13000000
00000042  sets B1 from @x2					 33 1601 03000000
00000049  sets B2 from @y2					 33 1701 04000000
00000050  sets @seed to A2					 35 0101 12000000
00000057  airdrop to coordinate(B1,B2) with @seed, @count		 34 5004 12000000 13000000

00000062  inc @count						 04 13000000
00000067  sets B1 from @x3					 33 1601 05000000
0000006e  sets B2 from @y3					 33 1701 06000000
00000075  sets @seed to A3					 35 0201 12000000
0000007c  airdrop to coordinate(B1,B2) with @seed, @count		 34 5004 12000000 13000000

00000087  inc @count						 04 13000000
0000008c  sets B1 from @x4					 33 1601 07000000
00000093  sets B2 from @y4					 33 1701 08000000
0000009a  sets @seed to A4					 35 0301 12000000
000000a1  airdrop to coordinate(B1,B2) with @seed, @count		 34 5004 12000000 13000000

000000ac  inc @count						 04 13000000
000000b1  sets B1 from @x5					 33 1601 09000000
000000b8  sets B2 from @y5					 33 1701 0a000000
000000bf  sets @tmp to A1						 35 0001 14000000
000000c6  add @tmp to @seed					 06 12000000 14000000
000000cf  airdrop to coordinate(B1,B2) with @seed, @count		 34 5004 12000000 13000000
000000da  finished						 28
